core_identity.brand_personality: Bold, playful, energetic, youthful, health-conscious, fun, irreverent
core_identity.positioning: Healthy energy drinks with a vibrant, lifestyle-focused approach

color_palette.color_strategy: High contrast, saturated, eye-catching, unapologetically bold

typography.brand_name_treatment: 'PERFECT' in bold uppercase, 'Ted' in script/cursive style
typography.product_text: Bold white uppercase letters for product names (MATCHA LATTE, HEALTHY ENERGY)
typography.hierarchy: Strong contrast between bold headers and smaller supporting text

label_layout.product_name: Bold white text below brand name

design_elements: Curved wave/organic shapes separating color zones
packaging_design.messaging: ALL NATURAL, NO ADDED SUGAR prominently displayed. MATCHA MADE EASY is their trademark

composition.framing: Dynamic angles, often low-angle hero shots, close-ups with dramatic perspective
composition.product_placement: Product as hero, often oversized or exaggerated in frame
composition.human_subjects: Partial body shots, focus on hands holding product, lifestyle moments
composition.scale_play: Intentional size distortion (giant cans, surreal proportions)

lighting.quality: Bright, high-key lighting with strong clarity
lighting.direction: Natural outdoor light or clean studio lighting
lighting.shadows: Minimal to moderate, maintaining product visibility

color_grading.tone: Warm to neutral, clean and fresh
color_grading.consistency: Vibrant across all images, no muted tones

locations: Clean studio backgrounds with bold color backdrops
settings.props: Minimal, product-focused, occasional lifestyle props (sunglasses, athletic wear)

lifestyle_aesthetic.target_audience: Active, health-conscious millennials and Gen Z (20-35 years)

wardrobe.colors: Predominantly green matching brand, neutral beiges/creams, athletic wear
wardrobe.style: Casual-athletic, modern, clean, coordinated with brand colors

lifestyle_aesthetic.body_language: Confident, energetic, joyful, dynamic poses, celebratory gestures
lifestyle_aesthetic.diversity: Inclusive representation, various ethnicities and body types

visual_motifs.texture_focus: Smooth can surfaces, condensation, liquid layers, ice
visual_motifs.patterns: Organic waves, color blocking, geometric simplicity

lifestyle_action.style: Dynamic, energetic, in-motion or posed action

technical_specifications.image_quality: High resolution, sharp focus, professional commercial photography
technical_specifications.aspect_ratios: Square (1:1) and vertical (4:5, 9:16) for social media optimization
technical_specifications.consistency: Cohesive visual language across all touchpoints

differentiation_strategy.vs_traditional_energy: Cleaner, more natural, lifestyle-focused vs aggressive/extreme
differentiation_strategy.vs_wellness_drinks: More fun, bold, and energetic vs overly serious/clinical
differentiation_strategy.unique_position: The intersection of health, energy, and playful confidence

essential_elements: Vibrant lime green as dominant brand color
Lifestyle context or bold color backdrop
image_generation_prompt_framework.style_keywords: commercial product photography, high-key lighting, vibrant colors, lifestyle brand aesthetic, modern wellness, energetic, bold, playful, clean composition, professional quality
